title: How the hell do you get S+ on Thresh
body:
i want level 7 on Thresh i have 1 mastery key so far and need two more .. but every time i play its either S- or A or lower

How do i gets good?

replies.body: Gordons Coming, the effective way to get S's are wards placed. Damage taken, assists, less deaths can also mean a little bit. And also the S,S+ can come from how well your team is going overall. Team scores etc, also effect it. Hope this helps! Best of luck for Mastery 7 Thresh
Honestly the only way for S or S+ on support is to kill steal and get 0-1 deaths. So basically play like an inconsiderate asshole. Sucks that is how the system works but whatever.
You need that madlife 100% hook accuracy
Go top lane, build like a brawler.
yeah but even if i do that i still get A's never S's
I've got the same problem with zed atm
Sell all your items at the end and build damage

Step 1. Take Ignite into Lane
Step 2. KS your ADC.
Step 3. Ignore the fact that he is raging and mute him/her.
Step 4. Keep whipin bitches until you win

You're gonna get level 7 soon bud.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/153362671/200474676

This is one of my S+ thresh games.
